title: Calamari Inkantation

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Empower a player with that heavenly melody during the day. That player is Purged, gains Powerful defense, and may act twice tonight. *Huh?! That heavenly melody... it's the one and only SQUID SISTERS!!*

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Day 5, you will broadcast your song to the entire Town. All evil players will have their attack reduced to Basic and defense to None. This applies until you die. *Radio override activated!*
- You can only self-target once, and only before Day 5.
